document_data.name: ''Quinlan's Endless Quiver''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Quinlan's endless quiver''''' was one of many strange and mysterious magic and mundane items found in [[Torleth Mindulspeer]]'s curio shop ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1372 DR, ''Quinlan's endless quiver'' could be found among the "antiques" within [[Torleth's Treasures]] of [[Gillian's Hill]]. The magical quiver was propped up at the back of the store on a simple wooden rack with a white piece of parchment attached to it. The price written on the tag was set to 500 [[gold]] pieces.
